title: Modern House for Sale at Ragama Road, Kadawatha.
details:
Brand New two stories modern type house (Design By Architect) for sale in Ragama Road Kadawatha.
95% completed.
2500 sq.ft
10 Perches.
03 Bedrooms.
02 Bathroom (1 Bathroom With Hot water, Completed with high quality imported
accessories)
Additional Servant Toilet outside.
04 Balconies Finished with titanium cement cut .
Interior floor fully tiled.
High residential environment .
1.2Km From Kadawatha Junction.
Price - 136.5 lakhs (13.6 million) Last.
Clear Deed for in need loan facility.
